release.action: [User Interface] Search for a nonexistent ticket produces a scary error dialog
[Core] Regenerate SOAP stubs in preparation for 1.2.5
[Core] Comments are not created if specified in the attachment page
[User Interface] Do not ask for a description when uploading attachments
[Core] Activating a task blocks the main thread if the due date needs to be read and the configuration is stale
[Core] Need to manually sync task to enable creation of sub tasks
[Core] Custom fields are not created when creating a sub-task
